text: The Kabul River railway station () is a Pakistan Railways train station in northwestern Pakistan. It is located on the Kabul River in the city of Nowshera, in the Nowshera District of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. It formerly served the Great Indian Peninsula Railway. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Pakistan Railways website Category:Railway stations in Nowshera District Category:Kabul River
title: Kabul River railway station
